statements: SELECT * FROM festival_lineups;
SELECT lineup_name, festival_date FROM festival_lineups WHERE lineup_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT lineup_name FROM festival_lineups ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_lineups WHERE festival_date >= '2023-01-01' AND festival_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) as lineup_count FROM festival_lineups;
SELECT * FROM festival_lineups ORDER BY festival_date DESC, lineup_name ASC;
SELECT lineup_name, festival_date FROM festival_lineups WHERE festival_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lineup_name, COUNT(*) AS total_lineups FROM festival_lineups GROUP BY lineup_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_lineups DESC;
SELECT lineup_id, lineup_name FROM festival_lineups WHERE lineup_name LIKE '%rock%';
SELECT * FROM festival_lineups WHERE festival_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY festival_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival_lineup WHERE festival_name='Coachella';
SELECT festival_name, festival_date FROM festival_lineup ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, performance_type FROM performance WHERE lineup_id=1;
SELECT * FROM festival_lineup WHERE festival_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT festival_name, COUNT(lineup_id) AS num_performances FROM festival_lineup JOIN performance ON festival_lineup.lineup_id = performance.lineup_id GROUP BY festival_name;
SELECT * FROM festival_lineup WHERE festival_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT festival_name, festival_date FROM festival_lineup WHERE festival_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, performance_type FROM performance WHERE performance_type = 'Main Act' AND artist_name LIKE '%The%';
SELECT festival_name, festival_date FROM festival_lineup WHERE festival_name = 'Summer Music Festival' AND festival_date BETWEEN '2023-06-01' AND '2023-08-31';
SELECT festival_name, lineup_id FROM festival_lineup JOIN performance ON festival_lineup.lineup_id = performance.lineup_id WHERE artist_name = 'Coldplay' ORDER BY festival_name ASC, lineup_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Lineups;
SELECT lineup_id, festival_id, lineup_date FROM Lineups WHERE total_artists > 10;
SELECT headliner, total_artists FROM Lineups ORDER BY total_artists DESC;
SELECT lineup_date, headliner, total_artists FROM Lineups WHERE festival_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Collaborations WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Lineups;
SELECT headliner, lineup_date FROM Lineups WHERE festival_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT headliner FROM Lineups WHERE total_artists > 5;
SELECT * FROM Performances WHERE stage = 'Main Stage' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT headliner, total_artists FROM Lineups WHERE lineup_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_artists DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival ORDER BY festival_name DESC;
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, festival_location FROM festival WHERE festival_start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT lineup_id, performance_date FROM lineup WHERE festival_id = 5 ORDER BY performance_date DESC, lineup_id ASC;
SELECT artist_name, performance_type FROM performance WHERE performance_type = 'live' ORDER BY artist_name;
SELECT collaboration_id, artist1_name, artist2_name, collaboration_type FROM collaboration WHERE collaboration_type = 'duet';
SELECT * FROM festival;
SELECT festival_name, festival_location FROM festival WHERE festival_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, performance_type FROM performance JOIN lineup ON performance.lineup_id = lineup.lineup_id;
SELECT artist1_name, artist2_name, collaboration_type FROM collaboration WHERE collaboration_type = 'Duet';
SELECT performance_date, performance_time FROM lineup WHERE lineup_id IN (SELECT lineup_id FROM performance WHERE performance_type = 'Live Band');
SELECT * FROM Lineups;
SELECT lineup_date, festival_name FROM Lineups ORDER BY lineup_date DESC;
SELECT performer_name, performance_date FROM Performances WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT primary_performer, secondary_performer, collaboration_date FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Lineups ORDER BY lineup_date DESC, festival_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT performer_name, performance_name FROM Performances WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01' AND performance_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT primary_performer, secondary_performer, collaboration_date FROM Collaborations WHERE primary_performer='John Doe' OR secondary_performer='Jane Smith';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE city='New York' AND country='USA';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, ticket_quantity FROM Tickets ORDER BY ticket_price ASC, ticket_type DESC LIMIT 5;
